body.name: Downy April Fresh Scent, Free of Dyes, Ultra Concentrated, Laundry Fabric Softener Liquid Eco-Box, 180 Loads
features: The protection of Downy, now in a slim, compact, eco-friendly box
Sustainable pack design made with 75% less plastic* (vs. 3 standard 51 fl oz bottles)
Fabric softener made with 100% renewable wind power electricity
Ultra Concentrated formula provides more conditioning ingredients per drop, per 180 laundry loads
Conditions and protects fabrics from stretching, fading, and fuzz with no dyes
body.description: Smart and environmentally friendly, this Downy Eco-Box Liquid Fabric Conditioner protects your clothes from stretching, fading, and fuzz—all in a concentrated formula. This fabric softener is made with less water for more conditioning per drop…so you can use less liquid per wash with the same protection you get from the bottle—all with no dyes. Not only that, its formula is made with 100% renewable wind electricity. Sustainably designed, this eco box is made with 75% less plastic* and is delivered to your door in a shipping-safe package. The pack’s slim, compact size saves space and its No-Drip twist cap minimizes spills and leaks. And with ultra-concentrated formula of Downy Eco-Box, you’ll get the softness and protection your fabrics need…only now, it comes in a smarter package. *per oz vs. 3 x 51 fl oz bottles

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Downy eCoBox Downy WrinkleGuard Downy April Fresh Liquid Fabric Enhancer Downy Dryer Sheets Downy Cool Cotton Liquid Fabric Enhancer Downy Cool Cotton Sheets Smarter packaging ✓ Fights stretching, fading, and fuzz ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ All day in-wear wrinkle protection ✓ Softens and fights static ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'll definitely buy again!
reviews.reviewText: Pros & ConsPros ... Easy to use for me. When I'm having a "flare" I have trouble with weakness in my hands. pushing buttons on the dispenser type or lifting the bottles is impossible. Issues resolved! Works great with my downy ball. Really like the scent. Will buy againCons ... Very heavy (great value for the size tho). Difficult for Me to open (from a disabled person standpoint). The cardboard covering the noosle was difficult but not impossible. Just need to be careful.From my perspective, The good definitely outweighs the bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using this for a few years now.
reviews.reviewText: I had to take the bag out of the box once and squeeze it out because for some reason, it was really thick. Definitely a space saver!!! Other than that, no complaints here!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a Greqt Item
reviews.reviewText: I love Downy. I love the softness and scent. The dispensing valve could use a reworking. It's hard to get the downy into a downy ball sometimes because the valve opening is very hard to see. So calculating when and how it runs out is difficult.I like the value of the box Downy. But a rework on the valve would be really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ultra concentrated, thick downy = ECO BOX
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as an alternative to the plastic jugs, arrived well packaged no leaks. As many other review state, the box is smaller than you will expect ( 7x7 inch) and liquid flows VERY fast from a new box. Definitely is original downy product, same scent etc..... but ultra concentrated/VERY thick- I use much less to get the same level of softness. It's a good product, no complaints ~ box is wobbly on top of the machines during use (same place I keep the plastic jugs for ease of use with my front load machine)Although this is a quality liquid fabric softener , in the future, I will buy the downy pouches and reuse/refill a plastic jug . After trying the eco-box, i feel the jugs are easier to handle (less fear of them falling over and leaking)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and recyclable to boot
reviews.reviewText: I love Downy but find it to be quite expensive compared to other fabric softeners. However, I was able to find this recyclable value “bottle” for such a great deal I didn’t even hesitate to see if I could find a better price because I knew that i couldn’t. And I’m very happy that the packaging is recyclable. I always buy my laundry products in bulk and recycle my large plastic bottles by filling them up with refill packaging. However, not only am I able to recycle the packaging I don’t have to worry about refilling bottles and possibly wasting product. This box of Downy is a total win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First time buyer of this and love it.
reviews.reviewText: Same good downy, in practical packaging. Best part about this is the spout does not drip at all. Tide has the same version so it’s perfect. The box is about the same size as the regular large downy container. Maybe an inch higher. But there’s also a small spot on the top of the box that holds the measuring cup! So much more practical on my shelf and the cup has a designated spot which is less mess on my shelf. Genius practical design and will not be going back to the bottles. Love this so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco box Downy
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this new echo box Downey that I came across it is so wonderful to know number one that I’m helping the environment but number two it is so easy to use it sits on top of my dryer whenever I wanna add it to my washer I just turn the dial and get what I need I pour it in my little container to dispense my softener and I put my cup back in it it’s holding place on the box and I’m done! I LOVE IT!!! ♥️♥️♥️

Downie is hard to find in Australia outside of Costco and Amazon.I love the fact this package minimises plastic by being only a plastic bag inside a cardboard box - much better for the environment and easier to dispose of.According to the box, this design uses 75% less plastic. I believe it.Downy smells good and is an excellent fabric softener.
Mon avis sera différente des autres.Pour moi la senteur ne ressemble en rien ai downy que nous avons ds les bouteilles.J'ai été très déçue !
